humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the tumor as 4.7 cm, which falls within the range for T2 tumors (more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm). Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the tumor size in greatest dimension is 47 mm (4.7 cm) in the right breast (F. RIGHT BREAST LUMP - BREAST TISSUE DISPLAYING POORLY DIFFERENTIATED DUCTAL ADENOCARCINOMA OF THE BREAST, HIGH GRADE (2+3+3), 47 MM. IN GREATEST DIMENSION). According to the TNM staging system for cancer, a T2 stage is assigned when the tumor size is more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm in greatest dimension. Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T2.
